title: Secret Breach Prevention in Software Artifacts
description: Undergraduate thesis supervised by Dr. Rifat Shahriyar (BUET). Focused on preventing secret breaches in software issue reports using BERT, RoBERTa, and regex-based detection techniques. Developed a detection tool and conducted a user survey.

title: Secret Detection in Source Codes Using Large Language Models
description: Research under Dr. Rifat Shahriyar (BUET) on secret detection in source codes using LLMs. Exploring zero-shot, few-shot, and fine-tuning approaches on LLAMA and Mistral.
status: Accepted in technical track in ESEM'2025

title: Brain Age Estimation from MRI Data
description: Research under Dr. M Sohel Rahman (BUET) on brain age estimation using Vision Transformers (ViT) for feature extraction from MRI scans and demographic attributes for prediction accuracy.
